name: THE LIAISON GROUP ON BEHALF OF CANNACRAFT
description: Community-oriented cannabis company providing recreational & medical products in CA.
sampleDescriptions: Cannabinoid regulations to be considered both within the FARM Bill/Ag Committees and HELP/Energy and Commerce FDA jurisdiction.
